description: NOTE: The case only fits the Fire Hd 7 2012 inch Tablet. It will NOT fit 2013 All New Fire HD 7 Tablet, or ANY OTHER Amazon tablet.Custom designed for your precious Amazon Kindle Fire HD 7" Android Tablet, this MoKo case features a combination of functionality and style. Well built to protect your Amazon Kindle Fire HD 7" Android Tablet for the years to come.Premium quality PU leather boosts a classy look.No-scratch microfiber interior adds comfort and an additional layer of protection.Wake or put your device to sleep by opening or closing the case.Access to all controls and features; device can be charged with case closed.Folding cover transforms the case to be a stand with two angles: perfect whenever you type an email or watch a movie.Interior hand strap for comfortable one-handed use.This product is sold exclusively by BSCstore. Only buy from BSCstore to get genuine MoKo(TM) products with Lifetime warranty and superb customer service.
title: MoKo Slim Cover Case for Amazon Kindle Fire HD 7" Inch Tablet (2012), BLACK (with Automatic Sleep/Wake Function,WILL NOT Fit 2013 All New Fire HD 7)
